titleStmt.title: A commentary or exposition vpon the first chapter of the prophecie of Amos Deliuered in xxi. sermons in the parish church of Meysey-Hampton in the diocesse of Glocester. By Sebastian Benefield ...
titleStmt.author: Benefield, Sebastian, 1559-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland, and are to be sold by Hugh Perry at the Harrow in Britaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part 1 of: Benefield, Sebastian. A commentary or exposition upon the three first chapters of the prophecie of Amos.
Cambridge University Library copy identified as STC 1865 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library and Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 653 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 734 (British Library copy).
